name: Gekko Moria
text: DON!! X1 When Attacking (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area) Discard 1 card from your hand: put the top 2 cards of your deck into the trash and play 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} characters with a cost of 4 or less from the trash.

effect.text: Discard 1 card from your hand: put the top 2 cards of your deck into the trash and play 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} characters with a cost of 4 or less from the trash.
